text:
It will be great to have the possibility to have fileset
with the unzip, untar, unjar task. In my case it is for 
j2me (cldc) preverify case. The preverify only accept 
classes and not jar file. So I have to unjar a set of 
jar file. This jar files list is in a property (constructed
thanks to several ant files on differents modules)
Or in a generic way a task like apply but not with an external
command but with a ant task.
 Thank you in advance.
creator: frederic.noyer@smart-fusion.com

text:
As for a generic way, this would make this report a duplicate of bug#1700.

In the case of unzip/jar there is an undocumented feature (don't tell 
anybody 8-), that is likely to disappear in Ant 1.5, but exists since 
Ant 1.1 - and even before that.

If you hand the task a directory instead of an archive as a source parameter, it
will assume that all files in that directory are archives and try to extract them.

Obviously, this is no real alternative to a fileset based solution, but can be 
used as a workaround.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
